mapper.sql: ROUTE_ID, ROUTE_CODE, ROUTE_NAME, SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID, ROUTE_TYPE, TAG, REMARK, CORP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, FLAG
a.ROUTE_ID, a.ROUTE_CODE, a.ROUTE_NAME, a.SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID, a.ROUTE_TYPE, a.TAG, a.REMARK, a.CORP_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, a.FLAG, b.USER_NAME as REF_CREATOR

where a.del = 0 and a.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId} and ( a.ROUTE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ref},'%') or a.ROUTE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ref},'%') ) and a.ROUTE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{routeCode},'%') and a.ROUTE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{routeName},'%') and a.SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID = #{settlementCityId} and a.ROUTE_TYPE = #{routeType} and a.TAG = #{tag} and a.REMARK = #{remark} and a.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and a.CREATOR = #{creator} and a.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and a.FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.insert: insert into vr_route (ROUTE_CODE, ROUTE_NAME, SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID, ROUTE_TYPE, TAG, REMARK, CORP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, FLAG) values (#{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into vr_route ROUTE_CODE, ROUTE_NAME, SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID, ROUTE_TYPE, TAG, REMARK, CORP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, FLAG, #{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update vr_route ROUTE_CODE = #{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_NAME = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID = #{settlementCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ROUTE_TYPE = #{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TAG = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update vr_route set ROUTE_CODE = #{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_NAME = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLEMENT_CITY_ID = #{settlementCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ROUTE_TYPE = #{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TAG = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from vr_route a join bd_user b on a.creator = b.user_id order by a.CREATE_DATE desc
